statements: SELECT * FROM hadoop_integration;
SELECT id, name, status FROM hadoop_integration WHERE age > 18;
SELECT name, age FROM hadoop_integration WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM hadoop_integration WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT id, name, age, status FROM hadoop_integration ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM hadoop_integration WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, age FROM hadoop_integration WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM hadoop_integration WHERE status IN ('Pending', 'Rejected') AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT id, name FROM hadoop_integration WHERE name LIKE 'J%' OR name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT id, status, age FROM hadoop_integration WHERE age <= 30 ORDER BY status ASC, age DESC;
SELECT * FROM big_data_table;
SELECT id, data FROM big_data_table WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, data FROM big_data_table WHERE data LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM hadoop_table ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, result FROM hadoop_table WHERE result IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM big_data_table WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, data FROM big_data_table WHERE id > 10;
SELECT data FROM big_data_table WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM big_data_table JOIN hadoop_table ON big_data_table.id = hadoop_table.id;
SELECT id, data FROM big_data_table WHERE data LIKE '%example%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM big_data_users;
SELECT user_id, email FROM big_data_users;
SELECT product_name, price FROM big_data_products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM big_data_orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM big_data_users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT * FROM big_data_users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM big_data_users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01' AND registration_date <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT u.username, o.order_date, p.product_name FROM big_data_users u JOIN big_data_orders o ON u.user_id = o.user_id JOIN big_data_products p ON o.total_amount >= p.price WHERE p.category = 'Electronics';

SELECT u.username, o.total_amount, p.product_name FROM big_data_users u INNER JOIN big_data_orders o ON u.user_id = o.user_id INNER JOIN big_data_products p ON o.total_amount >= p.price ORDER BY o.total_amount DESC, u.username ASC;
SELECT MAX(total_amount) AS max_amount, MIN(total_amount) AS min_amount, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_amount FROM big_data_orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND order_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT column1, column2, column3 FROM table1;
SELECT column2, column1, column3 FROM table2 WHERE column1 = 10;
SELECT column3, column1, column2 FROM table3 ORDER BY column1 DESC;
SELECT column1, column3, column2 FROM table4 WHERE column2 LIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM table1 WHERE column3 > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY column1 ASC;
SELECT column1, column2 FROM table1;
SELECT column3, column1 FROM table2 WHERE column3 > 100;
SELECT column1, column2, column3 FROM table3 ORDER BY column3 DESC;
SELECT column1, column2, column3 FROM table4 WHERE column1 > 500 AND column3 < 50.00;
SELECT column2, column1, column3 FROM table2 WHERE column2 LIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM HadoopData;
SELECT id, data FROM SQLData WHERE id > 10;
SELECT id, data FROM IntegrationData ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT H.id, T.transformed_data FROM TransformationData T JOIN IntegrationData I ON T.integration_id = I.id JOIN HadoopData H ON I.hadoop_id = H.id;
SELECT P.processing_type, P.result FROM ProcessingData P WHERE P.transformation_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM HadoopData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT data FROM SQLData WHERE id = 3;
SELECT hd.id, hd.data, td.transformed_data FROM HadoopData hd INNER JOIN IntegrationData id ON hd.id = id.hadoop_id INNER JOIN TransformationData td ON id.sql_id = td.integration_id;
SELECT pd.id, pd.processing_type, pd.result, trd.transformed_data FROM ProcessingData pd INNER JOIN TransformationData trd ON pd.transformation_id = trd.id WHERE pd.processing_type = 'ETL';
SELECT id, data FROM IntegrationData WHERE id IN (SELECT DISTINCT integration_id FROM TransformationData);
